name: Infected Friend
description:
Infected Friend is a 3rd person online pvp shooter. Infected versus survivors. Lobby for up to 8 players. One of the players becomes infected at the beginning of the round. His goal is to infect all other players. Other players will have to hold out for 60 seconds to win the round.

Infected Friend is more suitable for playing with friends. Create a lobby, choose a map and invite your friends! A lot of fun will be provided!

Regular updates will bring more maps, weapons, character customization and much more to the game! You can also offer your ideas and we will definitely consider each and implement the most interesting of them!

Features:
*playing for a survivor or infected (random at the beginning of the round)
*lobby for up to 8 players
*good graphic
*a lot of fan
*regular updfates

Play as a survivalist:
Do you have a gun
Do you have some bombs
You need to hold out for 60 seconds!

Play as an infected person:
Do you have an infection
When you infect a survivalist, he also becomes infected
You have 60 seconds to infect all the survivalists!
